org.forgerock.cuppa.internal

Enum TestContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TestContainer>
      • org.forgerock.cuppa.internal.TestContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TestContainer>

    public enum TestContainer
extends java.lang.Enum<TestContainer>
    Singleton container for user-defined tests.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      The singleton.

      • it

        public void it(java.lang.String description)
        Registers a pending test.

        A pending test has no implementation and acts as a reminder to the developer to write the implementation later.

        Parameters:
        description - The description of the test.

      • it

        public void it(Behaviour behaviour,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.util.Optional<TestFunction> function,
               Options options)
        Registers a test function to be run.
        Parameters:
        behaviour - If Behaviour.SKIP then this test will be skipped.
        description - The description of the test function.
        function - The test function.
        options - The set of options applied to the test.

      • with

        public TestBuilder with(Option... options)
        Decorate a test or block of tests with additional options.
        Parameters:
        options - Options to apply to the test/block.
        Returns:
        An object for building a test or test block with the given options.

      • skip

        public TestBuilder skip()
        Mark a test or block of tests to be skipped.
        Returns:
        An object for building the test or test block that will be skipped.

      • only

        public TestBuilder only()
        Mark a test or block of tests as the only tests that should be run.
        Returns:
        An object for building the test or test block that will be run.

      • tags

        public Option tags(java.lang.String... tags)
        Decorates tests with a set of tags. Tags can be used to group tests together to be included or excluded from a test run.
        Parameters:
        tags - String identifiers that can be used when running Cuppa to include or exclude a test/block.
        Returns:
        An option.

      • runTests

        public void runTests(java.lang.Runnable testRunner)
        For internal use only. Code that executes Cuppa tests should be wrapped in this method, which will ensure that test code doesn't try to declare more tests.
        Parameters:
        testRunner - A function that will run tests.

      • defineTests

        public TestBlock defineTests(java.lang.Class<?> testClass,
                             java.lang.Runnable testDefiner)
        Define tests within the context of a test class. All code that may call Cuppa methods should be wrapped in this method.
        Parameters:
        testClass - The class that the tests are defined in.
        testDefiner - A function that will define tests, usually by instantiating the given test class.
        Returns:
        A test block containing all the defined tests.
